resources.string: Invite your friends.They get free BOOK IT money worth 100 on signup.

string-array.name: header_titles
string-array.item: How do I create a booking through BOOK IT?
How do I check the status of my current bookings?
What are the valid ID proofs that I should carry?

string-array.name: h1_items
string-array.item: You can simply book a room through our app or by calling us on our 24*7 Customer Helpline.

string-array.name: h2_items
string-array.item: On the app, you can go to the "My Bookings" section to view the status of your bookings. You can also call on our Customer Helpline number to know the status of your bookings.

string-array.name: h3_items
string-array.item:
You need to carry a valid govt. issued address ID proof with photo with address not in he same city as the hotel. Some of the valid id proofs are: 
1. Driving license 
2. Voter id card 
3. Passport
